text:
CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
121 
Chapter 16: MEDICAL DISORDERS IN PREGNANCY 
• Medical disorders in pregnancy require careful attention to clinical management protocols.
• These correctly focus on physical health matters.
• It is also very important to take care of the mental health of women with medical disorders.
o Women with medical disorders are at higher risk of experiencing mental health difficulties.
o At the same time, women with mental health difficulties have a greater chance of
